properties.entry: FI-11-2 - NationalExtension is mandatory on E1, E3 and E4.
FI-11-1 - There cannot be multiple instances of FI-11.
FI-20-1 - There cannot be multiple instances of FI-11.
FI-30-1 - There cannot be multiple instances of FI-11.
FI-11-2 - Can only be a valid value of ApplicableLegislationNational.
FI-E1-BT-11-Procedure-Buyer-1 - is mandatory.
'Section identifier' (BT-13716-notice) is mandatory, except when: 'Version of the previous notice to be changed' (BT-758-notice) is not filled in (in 'E1')
'Section identifier' (BT-13716-notice) is not allowed when: 'Version of the previous notice to be changed' (BT-758-notice) is not filled in (in 'E1')
'Description of changes' (BT-141(a)-notice) is mandatory, except when: 'Section identifier' (BT-13716-notice) is not filled in (in 'E1')
'Description of changes' (BT-141(a)-notice) is not allowed when: 'Section identifier' (BT-13716-notice) is not filled in (in 'E1')
FI-E1-BT-17-Lot-1 - is mandatory.
FI-E1-BT-23-Part-1 - is mandatory.
FI-E1-BT-262-Part-1 - is mandatory.
FI-E1-BT-501-Organization-Company-1 - is mandatory.
'Email' (BT-506-Organization-Company) is mandatory when: the organisation (OPT-200-Organization-Company) is a Buyer (OPT-300-Procedure-Buyer) (in 'E1')
'Country subdivision (NUTS)' (BT-507-Organization-Company) is mandatory, except when: 'Country' (BT-514-Organization-Company) does not have NUTS codes (in 'E1')
Country subdivision (NUTS)' (BT-507-Organization-Company) is not allowed when: 'Country' (BT-514-Organization-Company) does not have NUTS codes (in 'E1')
FI-E1-BT-513-Organization-Company-1 - is mandatory.
'Description' (BT-745-Lot) is mandatory when: Electronic submission is 'not allowed' or 'allowed' (in 'E3')
FI-E1-BT-758-notice-1 - is mandatory.
FI-E1-FI-11-1 - is forbidden.
FI-E1-FI-20-1 - is mandatory.
FI-E1-FI-30-1 - is mandatory.
FI-E3-BT-105-Procedure-1 - is mandatory.
'Justification for the duration of the framework agreement' (BT-109-Lot) is mandatory, except when: Duration of the lot must be greater than 4 years (in 'E3')
'Justification for the duration of the framework agreement' (BT-109-Lot) is not allowed when: Duration of the lot must be greater than 4 years (in 'E3')

'Maximum number of participants' (BT-113-Lot) is mandatory, except when: 'Framework agreement is involved' (BT-765-Lot) is not one of the following: 'Framework agreement, partly without reopening and partly with reopening of competition'; 'Framework agreement, with reopening of competition'; 'Framework agreement, without reopening of competition' (in 'E3'

'Maximum number of participants' (BT-113-Lot) is not allowed when: 'Framework agreement is involved' (BT-765-Lot) is not one of the following: 'Framework agreement, partly without reopening and partly with reopening of competition'; 'Framework agreement, with reopening of competition'; 'Framework agreement, without reopening of competition' (in 'E3')
FI-E3-BT-11-Procedure-Buyer-1 - is mandatory.
'Section identifier' (BT-13716-notice) is mandatory, except when: 'Version of the previous notice to be changed' (BT-758-notice) is not filled in (in 'E3')
'Section identifier' (BT-13716-notice) is not allowed when: 'Version of the previous notice to be changed' (BT-758-notice) is not filled in (in 'E3')
'Description of changes' (BT-141(a)-notice) is mandatory, except when: 'Section identifier' (BT-13716-notice) is not filled in (in 'E3')
'Description of changes' (BT-141(a)-notice) is not allowed when: 'Section identifier' (BT-13716-notice) is not filled in (in 'E3')
FI-E3-BT-14-Lot-1 - is mandatory.
FI-E3-BT-14-Part-1 - is mandatory.
FI-E3-BT-17-Lot-1 - is mandatory.
FI-E3-BT-23-Part-1 - is mandatory.
FI-E3-BT-262-Part-1 - is mandatory.

'The criteria will be used to select the candidates to be invited for the second stage of the procedure' (BT-40-Lot) is mandatory, except when: 'Selection criteria' (BT-809-Lot) does not exist or 'The procedure will take place in successive stages. At each stage, some participants may be eliminated' (BT-52-Lot) is not 'yes' or 'Type of procedure' (BT-105) is not 'Competitive dialogue', 'Innovation partnership', 'Negotiated with prior publication of a call for competition / competitive with negotiation', 'Other multiple stage procedure', or 'Restricted' (in 'E3')

'The criteria will be used to select the candidates to be invited for the second stage of the procedure' (BT-40-Lot) is not allowed when: 'Selection criteria' (BT-809-Lot) does not exist or 'The procedure will take place in successive stages. At each stage, some participants may be eliminated' (BT-52-Lot) is not 'yes' or 'Type of procedure' (BT-105) is not 'Competitive dialogue', 'Innovation partnership', 'Negotiated with prior publication of a call for competition / competitive with negotiation', 'Other multiple stage procedure', or 'Restricted' (in 'E3')
FI-E3-BT-501-Organization-Company-1 - is mandatory.
'Email' (BT-506-Organization-Company) is mandatory when: the organisation (OPT-200-Organization-Company) is a Buyer (OPT-300-Procedure-Buyer) (in 'E3')
'Country subdivision (NUTS)' (BT-507-Organization-Company) is mandatory, except when: 'Country' (BT-514-Organization-Company) does not have NUTS codes (in 'E3')
'Country subdivision (NUTS)' (BT-507-Organization-Company) is not allowed when: 'Country' (BT-514-Organization-Company) does not have NUTS codes (in 'E3')
FI-E3-BT-513-Organization-Company-1 - is mandatory.

'The procedure will take place in successive stages. At each stage, some participants may be eliminated' (BT-52-Lot) is mandatory when: 'Type of procedure' (BT-105) must not be either 'Competitive dialogue', 'Innovation partnership'; 'Negotiated with prior publication of a call for competition / competitive with negotiation' (in 'E3')
FI-E3-BT-539-Lot-1 - is mandatory.
'Type' (BT-539-LotsGroup) is mandatory, except when: Lot ID is not filled in (in 'E3')
'Type' (BT-539-LotsGroup) is not allowed when: Lot ID is not filled in (in 'E3')
FI-E3-BT-60-Lot-1 - is mandatory.
'Deadline for receipt of expressions of interest' (BT-630(d)-Lot) is not allowed (in 'E3')
'Deadline for receipt of expressions of interest' (BT-630(t)-Lot) is not allowed (in 'E3')

'There is a maximum number of candidates to be invited for the second stage of the procedure' (BT-661-Lot) is mandatory, except when: 'Type of procedure' (BT-105) is 'Open' or 'Other single stage procedure' or 'Negotiated without prior call for competition' (in 'E3')

'There is a maximum number of candidates to be invited for the second stage of the procedure' (BT-661-Lot) is not allowed when: 'Type of procedure' (BT-105) is 'Open' or 'Other single stage procedure' or 'Negotiated without prior call for competition' (in 'E3')
FI-E3-BT-71-Lot-1 - is mandatory.
FI-E3-BT-71-Part-1 - is mandatory.
FI-E3-BT-736-Lot-1 - is mandatory.
FI-E3-BT-736-Part-1 - is mandatory.
'Description' (BT-745-Lot) is mandatory when: Electronic submission is 'not allowed' or 'allowed' (in 'E3')
'Description' (BT-750-Lot) is mandatory, except when: The selection criterion (BT-809) code does not exist (in 'E3')
'Description' (BT-750-Lot) is not allowed when: The selection criterion (BT-809) code does not exist (in 'E3')
FI-E3-BT-751-Lot-1 - is mandatory.
{ND-SecondStageWeightCriterionParameter} ${(BT-7531-Lot is present or BT-7532-Lot is present)}
FI-E3-BT-758-notice-1 - is mandatory.
FI-E3-BT-765-Lot-1 - is mandatory.
FI-E3-BT-765-Part-1 - is mandatory.

FI-E3-BT-766-Part-1 - is mandatory.
FI-E3-BT-767-Lot-1 - is mandatory.
(BT-769-Lot) is not allowed (in 'E3')
count(cbc:Description) > 0 or not(cbc:ProcedureCode/normalize-space(text()) = ('oth-mult','oth-single'))
FI-E3-BT-97-Lot-1 - is mandatory.
FI-E3-FI-11-1 - is mandatory.
FI-E3-FI-20-1 - is mandatory.
FI-E3-FI-30-1 - is mandatory.
FI-E4-BT-105-Procedure-1 - is mandatory.

count(cac:ContractingActivity/cbc:ActivityTypeCode[@listName='authority-activity']) > 0 or not(cac:ContractingPartyType/cbc:PartyTypeCode[@listName='buyer-legal-type']/normalize-space(text()) = ('body-pl','body-pl-cga','body-pl-la','body-pl-ra','cga','def-cont','eu-ins-bod-ag','grp-p-aut','int-org','la','org-sub','org-sub-cga','org-sub-la','org-sub-ra','ra'))

count(cac:ContractingActivity/cbc:ActivityTypeCode[@listName='authority-activity']) = 0 or (cac:ContractingPartyType/cbc:PartyTypeCode[@listName='buyer-legal-type']/normalize-space(text()) = ('body-pl','body-pl-cga','body-pl-la','body-pl-ra','cga','def-cont','eu-ins-bod-ag','grp-p-aut','int-org','la','org-sub','org-sub-cga','org-sub-la','org-sub-ra','ra'))

'Approximate value of the framework agreements' (BT-1118-NoticeResult) is mandatory, except when: No winner was chosen; It is not a framework contract; 'Re-estimated value of the framework agreement' (BT-660-LotResult) is not filled in (in 'E4')

'Approximate value of the framework agreements' (BT-1118-NoticeResult) is not allowed when: No winner was chosen; It is not a framework contract; 'Re-estimated value of the framework agreement' (BT-660-LotResult) is not filled in (in 'E4')

'Maximum value of the framework agreements in this notice' (BT-118-NoticeResult) is mandatory, except when: No winner was chosen; It is not a framework contract; 'Maximum value of the framework agreement' (BT-709-LotResult) is not filled in (in 'E4')

'Maximum value of the framework agreements in this notice' (BT-118-NoticeResult) is not allowed when: No winner was chosen; It is not a framework contract; 'Maximum value of the framework agreement' (BT-709-LotResult) is not filled in (in 'E4')
FI-E4-BT-11-Procedure-Buyer-1 - is mandatory.
'Section identifier' (BT-13716-notice) is mandatory, except when: 'Version of the previous notice to be changed' (BT-758-notice) is not filled in (in 'E4')
'Section identifier' (BT-13716-notice) is not allowed when: 'Version of the previous notice to be changed' (BT-758-notice) is not filled in (in 'E4')
'Description of changes' (BT-141(a)-notice) is mandatory, except when: 'Section identifier' (BT-13716-notice) is not filled in (in 'E4')
'Description of changes' (BT-141(a)-notice) is not allowed when: 'Section identifier' (BT-13716-notice) is not filled in (in 'E4')

'The reason why a winner was not chosen' (BT-144-LotResult) is mandatory, except when: 'Winner selection status' (BT-142-LotResult) is not 'No winner was chosen and the competition is closed.' (in 'E4')
'The reason why a winner was not chosen' (BT-144-LotResult) is not allowed when: 'Winner selection status' (BT-142-LotResult) is not 'No winner was chosen and the competition is closed.' (in 'E4')
'Value of all contracts awarded in this notice' (BT-161-NoticeResult) is mandatory, except when: No winner was chosen; It is not a framework contract (in 'E4')
'Value of all contracts awarded in this notice' (BT-161-NoticeResult) is not allowed when: No winner was chosen; It is not a framework contract (in 'E4')
FI-E4-BT-262-Part-1 - is mandatory.
FI-E4-BT-501-Organization-Company-1 - is mandatory.
'Email' (BT-506-Organization-Company) is mandatory when: the organisation (OPT-200-Organization-Company) is a Buyer (OPT-300-Procedure-Buyer) (in 'E4')
'Country subdivision (NUTS)' (BT-507-Organization-Company) is mandatory, except when: 'Country' (BT-514-Organization-Company) does not have NUTS codes (in 'E4')
'Country subdivision (NUTS)' (BT-507-Organization-Company) is not allowed when: 'Country' (BT-514-Organization-Company) does not have NUTS codes (in 'E4')
FI-E4-BT-513-Organization-Company-1 - is mandatory.
FI-E4-BT-539-Lot-1 - is mandatory.
'Type' (BT-539-LotsGroup) is mandatory, except when: Lot ID is not filled in (in 'E4')
'Type' (BT-539-LotsGroup) is not allowed when: Lot ID is not filled in (in 'E4')
FI-E4-BT-60-Lot-1 - is mandatory.
FI-E4-BT-758-notice-1 - is mandatory.

'Type of received submissions' (BT-760-LotResult) is mandatory, except when: 'Winner selection status' (BT-142-LotResult) is 'The winner was not yet chosen, but the competition is still ongoing.' (in 'E4')
'Type of received submissions' (BT-760-LotResult) is not allowed when: 'Winner selection status' (BT-142-LotResult) is 'The winner was not yet chosen, but the competition is still ongoing.' (in 'E4')
FI-E4-BT-765-Lot-1 - is mandatory.
FI-E4-BT-765-Part-1 - is mandatory.
FI-E4-BT-766-Lot-1 - is mandatory.
FI-E4-BT-766-Part-1 - is mandatory.
FI-E4-BT-767-Lot-1 - is mandatory.
'Subcontracting' (BT-773-Tender) is mandatory, except when: 'Technical ID of the tender' (OPT-321-Tender) is not filled in (in 'E4')
'Subcontracting' (BT-773-Tender) is not allowed when: 'Technical ID of the tender' (OPT-321-Tender) is not filled in (in 'E4')
